name: re-pairs (iviuriel)
description:
Game made for the 2020 Global Game Jam Theme: repair

These are your pushpins.

Aren't they cute?.

Tap on them to see the things they love.

Grab and drop them next to another pushpin to make a couple.

They'll talk about their interests and what makes them tick.

If they're a good match their love metter will fill.

The more love the better!

This is your global love metter.

It represents the total love of your population.

Can you fill the love tonight?

The Team:

Iván Uriel Jimenez  

Alejandro Pérez  

Susana Pineda 

Álvaro Gomez  

Thank you and have fun!
